scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Nicole C
scrape.text: Didn't like this one. The characters were horrible, and the writing was stilted and disconnected in places. I've read many reviews saying that perhaps this was due to the English translation. I read it all the way through hoping my distaste for the book would eventually change. Unfortunately it did not. Just wish I would've checked this one out of the library rather than spend my money on it.
